content.question: A sample of an ideal monatomic gas can be taken through each of the processes shown on the above graph of pressure as a function of volume. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitude of the change in internal energy <math alttext="delta U" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>U</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the gas for each of the processes?

choices.label: <math alttext="the absolute value of delta U sub 1 is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 2, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 3, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta U sub 2 is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 3, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 4, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta U sub 4 is greater than, open parenthesis, the absolute value of delta U sub 3 equals the absolute value of delta U sub 1, close parenthesis, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of delta U sub 4 is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 1, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 2, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of delta U sub 4 is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 1, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 2, which is greater than the absolute value of delta U sub 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
